data.text: «Zalaɠa ɠula nuiti, à woilo nii ma!
Wooʋalada nuiti ti zeɠe zuɠoozagi wɔa Sitime.
Izilayɛle ná-wasogi ɠa zeele wooi wosu daalɔɠɔma.
Ta li Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaiziɛzu ga ta-logani goiti ta ma wolaiti,
Yeei Efelayime ná-kpakɔi zeelizu la ma,
Zuda ɠundiɠiiti ta ga numaa ti kwɛpelegiti seɠezu daazu,
Nɔ̀un nà ɠɛɛzu ga fɔingi Efelayime wolodai ʋa,
Tɔɔzei nà ɓɔɠɔi ɠa gè Efelayime zosu,
Nà li, gè ɠale ma nà-pɛlɛi wu,
